WelcomeSubTitle: The community for friends of the liquid fun!
GetStarted: To get started, please press the beer!
GetStartedInvited: Press the Beer to accept the invitation!
NoPendingFriendRequests: You have no pending friend requests
SentFriendRequest: The friend request has been sent.
FriendRequestHint: Hint: To add a friend, go to his profile and send him a friend request.
NoActiveFriends: You have got no active friends.
FindFriendsAt: Have a look if you find some over here
OperationFailed: That didn't work. Please try again!
FindFriendsOnDrinkersPage: Go to the drinkers page and find some new friends by sending them a friend request.
EnterDrinks: Or enter some drinks with the plus symbol on the bottom right!
InviteFriendDescription: Press the button to create an invitation.
InviteShareInfo: Share this link with your friend.
InvitationText: You have been invited by {{userName}} to join Binge Buddy.
CopiedToClipboardNowSend: Copied to clipboard. Now go and send it to your friend.
InvitationAccepted: This invitation has already been accepted.
RankingInfo: Drinks in the last month count. Earn hardness points by inviting friends or winning drink events.
ReallyLeaveVenue: Do you really want to leave this venue?
NewVenue: Did you enter a new bar?
ImageActivityMessage: uploaded an image or a video!
DrinkEventWinMessage: You won the drink event and earned {0} hardness points!
DrinkEventActivityWinMessage: I won {0} hardness points at a drink event! Yeah!
DrinkEventNotificationMessage: Drink something within the next 30 minutes and earn {0} hardness points!
DrinkReminderMessage: You did not drink for quite a while. Did you forget to tell me?
RecruitmentActivityMessage: I recruited a new drinker ({0}) and earned {1} hardness points for that.
DrinkEventMessage: Drink something before the countdown expires and earn hardness points!
ReallyDeleteDrink: Do you really want to delete this drink?
RenameMessage: {{originalUserName}} has renamed and is now known as {{userName}}!
ReallyDeleteActivity: Do you really want to delete this activity?
Onboarding_Description_Activitys: Enter drinks using the plus-symbol, upload pics and videos and show where you are currently drinking by entering a bar.
Onboarding_Description_Navmenu: Open the navigation menu to explore what you can do.
Onboarding_Description_Drinkers: Find friends in the drinkers view.
Onboarding_Description_Stats: Get rich statistics about your drinking habits.
Onboarding_Description_Map: Find out where your friends are currently drinking.
Onboarding_Description_Profile: Change your name and upload a profile image.
Onboarding_Description_Drinks: Create your favorite drinks for use within the application.
Onboarding_Done: Congrats! You've made it so far!
Onboarding_Done_Message: Let me have a drink now
